DOC.brief_summary: In previous study use FreeStyle Navigator Continuous Glucose Monitoring ( CGM ) System obtain 30 day glucose measurement 30 people diabetes treat insulin . The purpose study characterize glycemia ( glucose ) control 30 people without diabetes compare data 30 people diabetes previous study . Through approach may possible develop mean establish model normal glucose pattern basis comparison glucose pattern people diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Establishing Ambulatory Glucose Profiles People Without Diabetes Using CGM Data
DOC.criteria: Male female Within normal range two hour OGTT glucose level ( < 140 mg/dl ) Within normal range fast glucose level ( < 100 mg/dl ) Within normal range total insulin level measure radioimmunoassay BMI < 30kg/m2 Age 2175 year age , inclusive ( 15 subject 2149 year age group , 15 subject 5075 year age group ) Willing give inform consent Capable follow protocol instruction study staff Available schedule visit Access telephone communication Under 21 year age 75 year age Abnormal OGTT Previous history diabetes Outside normal insulin range BMI > 30kg/m2 Unable follow protocol Unable read write English Skin abnormality insertion sit Allergy adhesives Any concomitant medical condition would likely affect evaluation device performance Taken prednisone cortisone medication previous 30 day Blood transfusion within past 90 day Blood donation within past 30 day Metabolic syndrome ( NCEP ATP III guideline ) Any medical condition would affect glucose ( per investigator decision )
